content:

inventory=[{"type": "dark_oak_sapling", "quantity": 10, "index": 13}, {"type": "fire_coral_fan", "quantity": 56, "index": 14}, {"type": "gold_nugget", "quantity": 22, "index": 16}, {"type": "spectral_arrow", "quantity": 22, "index": 20}, {"type": "yellow_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 18, "index": 24}, {"type": "golden_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "cyan_concrete", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "cyan_terracotta", "quantity": 56, "index": 28}, {"type": "quartz_slab", "quantity": 2, "index": 31}, {"type": "gunpowder", "quantity": 47, "index": 32}, {"type": "villager_spawn_egg", "quantity": 37, "index": 34}, {"type": "iron_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "birch_pressure_plate", "quantity": 63, "index": 37}, {"type": "diorite_slab", "quantity": 27, "index": 39}, {"type": "brick", "quantity": 43, "index": 44}, {"type": "stone_axe", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft chiseled_quartz_block, I need to place two quartz_slabs on top of each other. The first quartz_slab is currently in slot 31, so I will move it to the crafting grid at slot 1.
act: move from slot 31 to slot 1 with quantity 1
